results.title: Combination therapy of statin with flavonoids rich extract from chokeberry fruits enhanced reduction in cardiovascular risk markers in patients after myocardial infraction (MI).
results.text_hl: Forty-four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (11 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ and 33 @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@, mean age 66 years) who survived @<m>DISEASE_Freiberg's_disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535636 @@@myocardial infraction@@@ and have received statin therapy for at least 6 months (80% dose of 40 mg/day @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) were included in the study.

citations.NLM: Naruszewicz M, Laniewska I, Millo B, Dłuzniewski M. Combination therapy of statin with flavonoids rich extract from chokeberry fruits enhanced reduction in cardiovascular risk markers in patients after myocardial infraction (MI). Atherosclerosis. 2007 Oct;194(2):e179-84. PMID: 17320090
